title: Mustasch discography 2001 - 2015
description:
Mustasch discography 2001 - 2015

This discography contains the following: 9 albums, 2 EPs, 2 compilation albums, and 1 live album.

2001 The True Sound of the New West (EP)
2002 Above All
2003 Ratsafari
2005 Powerhouse
2006 Parasite! (EP)
2007 Latest Version of the Truth
2008 Lowlife Highlights (compilation album)
2008 In the Night - Live in Gothenburg (live album)
2009 Singles A's & B's (compilation album)
2009 Mustasch
2011 The New Sound of the True Best
2012 Sounds Like Hell, Looks Like Heaven
2014 Thank You For the Demon
2015 Testosterone

For official Mustasch news, see: http://www.mustasch.net/news/

For Mustasch tour dates, see: http://www.mustasch.net/tour/

Mustasch Biography: http://www.mustasch.net/band/
